protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for cysteinyl leukotrienes mediating bronchoconstriction of individuals with and without asthma. Stimulation by LTD4 results in the contraction and proliferation of smooth muscle, edema, eosinophil migration and damage to the mucus layer in the lung. This response is mediated via a G-protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. The rank order of affinities for the leukotrienes is LTD4 >> LTE4 = LTC4 >> LTB4

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
